summary_overall: Customers demand faster, clearer, and more reliable communication across all interactions.
Delivery speed and accuracy are critical to avoid project delays and maintain customer trust.
Product specification clarity and quality assurance are essential to meet application requirements and avoid rework.

Product.issue_summary: Product mismatches and unclear specifications cause project delays and rework.
Product.action: Establish earlier, clearer communication channels with clients to confirm product specs before order processing.

Product.issue_summary: Customers face issues with product quality such as coating defects and missing certifications.
Product.action: Implement stricter quality control and ensure timely delivery of all required certificates and test reports.

Product.issue_summary: Products need to meet specific technical requirements such as corrosion resistance and dimension consistency.
Product.action: Source or develop products that conform to specific application needs and maintain batch-to-batch consistency.

Product.issue_summary: Customers want the ability to amend orders after placement to accommodate specification changes.
Product.action: Introduce a process or system allowing limited amendments to purchase orders post-submission.

Service.issue_summary: Delays and gaps in responding to customer inquiries reduce satisfaction.
Service.action: Set strict response time standards and monitor email and call responsiveness continuously.

Service.issue_summary: Customers expect service quality to remain consistently high across projects and locations.
Service.action: Standardize service protocols and monitor service delivery to maintain uniform customer experience.

Delivery.issue_summary: Delivery speed does not meet critical deadlines causing project risks.
Delivery.action: Prioritize and expedite deliveries for time-sensitive orders and offer premium shipping options.

Delivery.issue_summary: Issues with incomplete deliveries and lack of accurate delivery status updates.
Delivery.action: Implement stronger verification processes at dispatch and provide customers with real-time tracking and clear status updates.

Delivery.issue_summary: Drivers face difficulties locating sites, causing delivery delays.
Delivery.action: Enhance shipment details with clearer location information and provide direct contact numbers for drivers.

Delivery.issue_summary: Packaging shortcomings cause product damage such as rust and coating defects.
Delivery.action: Improve packaging materials and methods to better protect products during transit.

Payment.issue_summary: Errors in sending calibration certificates and mismatch in documentation create vendor issues.
Payment.action: Ensure correct and prompt issuance of all payment-related verification documents to appropriate recipients.
